title: Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Arabic men)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Men - Psychology
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: Young men, Arabic men - all have a story to tell
description: Nine young men from various Arabic backgrounds share their stories and memories of family, country and culture through this ACMI digital storytelling workshop held on 10-12 October 2007, sponsored by Mens Line Australia.
